name: Panamaxil
description: Panamax Inc. is a global leader in developing leading fintech and telecom solutions for digital transactions, switching, billing, fraud management and revenue assurance helping banks, financial institutions, enterprises, telecom operators, MNOs, and MVNOs. Founded in 2001 by Mr. Bankim Brahmbhatt, the company headquartered in New York, USA, has successfully carved its position in the financial and telecom technology sectors. Panamax offers the world’s leading digital financial platform MobiFin which has made digital finances a reality in several countries. As part of its digital financial offerings, the company offers Core Banking System, e-Lend, and smart biometrics solutions, while Campaign Manager and Loyalty & Rewards under the Customer Value Management portfolio. The Revenue Management solutions developed by Panamax include BillCall, Fraud Management, and Revenue Assurance to ensure complete financial management for carriers, while the switching and transcoding needs are taken care of by iMax Class-4 Softswitch and Bridge2Call Enterprise Retail Switch. Panamax also offers Traffic Monitoring Solutions to allow regulators to gain access to data pertaining to international and national traffic of operators. Its Managed Services and System Integration services are meant to build and manage a robust IT ecosystem for its clients.
